items.title: Sunshine
items.plot: 50 years into the future, the Sun begins to die, and Earth is dying as a result. A team of astronauts is sent to revive the Sun - but the mission fails. Seven years later, a new team is sent to finish the mission as mankind's last hope.
items.stars: Cillian Murphy, Rose Byrne, Chris Evans, Cliff Curtis
items.companies: DNA Films, Ingenious Film Partners, Moving Picture Company (MPC)

similars.title: 28 Days Later...
similars.plot: Four weeks after a mysterious, incurable virus spreads throughout the UK, a handful of survivors try to find sanctuary.
similars.stars: Cillian Murphy, Naomie Harris, Christopher Eccleston

similars.title: Moon
similars.plot: Astronaut Sam Bell has a quintessentially personal encounter toward the end of his three-year stint on the Moon, where he, working alongside his computer, GERTY, sends back to Earth parcels of a resource that has helped diminish our planet's power problems.
similars.stars: Sam Rockwell, Kevin Spacey, Dominique McElligott

similars.title: Event Horizon
similars.plot: A rescue crew investigates a spaceship that disappeared into a black hole and has now returned...with someone or something new on-board.
similars.stars: Laurence Fishburne, Sam Neill, Kathleen Quinlan

similars.title: Children of Men
similars.plot: In 2027, in a chaotic world in which women have become somehow infertile, a former activist agrees to help transport a miraculously pregnant woman to a sanctuary at sea.
similars.stars: Julianne Moore, Clive Owen, Chiwetel Ejiofor

similars.title: Gattaca
similars.plot: A genetically inferior man assumes the identity of a superior one in order to pursue his lifelong dream of space travel.
similars.stars: Ethan Hawke, Uma Thurman, Jude Law

similars.title: 28 Weeks Later
similars.plot: Six months after the rage virus was inflicted on the population of Great Britain, the US Army helps to secure a small area of London for the survivors to repopulate and start again. But not everything goes according to plan.
similars.stars: Jeremy Renner, Rose Byrne, Robert Carlyle

similars.title: Pandorum
similars.plot: Two crew members of a spaceship wake up from hypersleep to discover that all their colleagues are missing. Despite this, it appears that they are not alone.
similars.stars: Dennis Quaid, Ben Foster, Cam Gigandet

similars.title: Contact
similars.plot: Dr. Ellie Arroway, after years of searching, finds conclusive radio proof of extraterrestrial intelligence, sending plans for a mysterious machine.
similars.stars: Jodie Foster, Matthew McConaughey, Tom Skerritt

similars.title: Equilibrium
similars.plot: In an oppressive future where all forms of feeling are illegal, a man in charge of enforcing the law rises to overthrow the system and state.
similars.stars: Christian Bale, Sean Bean, Emily Watson

similars.title: Europa Report
similars.plot: An international crew of astronauts undertakes a privately funded mission to search for life on Jupiter's fourth largest moon.
similars.stars: Sharlto Copley, Michael Nyqvist, Christian Camargo

similars.title: The Tesseract
similars.plot: A psychologist, an Englishman, a bellboy and a wounded female assassin have their fates crossed at a sleazy Bangkok hotel.
similars.stars: Jonathan Rhys Meyers, Saskia Reeves, Alexander Rendell

similars.title: Sphere
similars.plot: A spaceship is discovered under three hundred years' worth of coral growth at the bottom of the ocean.
similars.stars: Dustin Hoffman, Sharon Stone, Samuel L. Jackson
